title: New Pulsefire Ezreal Icon Delivery
body: I've heard that the icon is supposed to be delivered yesterday, the deadline 5/29/17, however, I still haven't received my icon yet, do I have to do anything to get the icon?

replies.body: It's the 2nd now and I have still yet to recieve my icon.

We're still distributing these icons out!  T**here's a lot of eligible accounts, so we'll need just a little more time. ** 

Per the[ announcement page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/pulsefire-caitlyn) (red post in comment section), about two more days to wrap everything up. 

Just to make sure you're all set, I went ahead and added the Pulsefire Ezreal Icon to your account.  

In case anyone else is waiting for their icons, hang tight we're almost finished!

--Edited for clarity.
Have yet to receive my icon. Is it by the end of June 1st?
I also have not received it yet
i don't have the Pulsefire Ezreal icon either
